Worcester.100 Front Street:
100 Front Street (formerly Mechanics National Bank Tower) is a high-rise building located in downtown Worcester, Massachusetts. In early 2016, the former Worcester Center complex, comprising 100 Front Street and the adjacent nine story tower at 120 Front Street were named The Mercantile Center by its owner, Franklin Realty Advisors.
At 226 feet (69 m), the 20-story office tower is the third tallest building in Worcester (behind Sky Mark Tower and Worcester Plaza, both 288 feet (88 m) high).
